title: Language Teaching Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language instruction techniques and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Professional development for elementary language teachers using mobile devices (BYOD) to implement learning analytics tools and improve pedagogical methods

learning_goals: Diagnose learners' language acquisition patterns with ≥80% accuracy using learning analytics data.
Design ≥3 personalized instructional strategies based on data collected from a mobile microlearning environment.
Identify at-risk learners and implement intervention strategies within 48 hours based on learning analytics.
Propose pedagogical improvement plans by integrating qualitative/quantitative data collected during the learning process.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
